sports.name: Netball
sports.description: Netball is one of our flagship sports at CLC, with teams competing at all levels from recreational to elite.
highlights: Teams from U12 through to 1st VII
Regular fixtures against top independent schools
sports.training: Multiple sessions per week with match fixtures on Wednesdays and Saturdays

sports.name: Lacrosse
sports.description: Lacrosse has a rich tradition at CLC, combining speed, skill and teamwork in one of the most exciting team sports.
highlights: One of the top lacrosse schools in the country
Opportunities for beginners and elite players
sports.training: Training sessions throughout the week with fixtures on Wednesdays and weekends

sports.name: Hockey
sports.description: Hockey at CLC offers competitive opportunities for all abilities, from beginners to those aiming for representative honours.
sports.training: Regular training with matches midweek and weekends

sports.name: Tennis
sports.description: Tennis thrives at CLC with excellent facilities and coaching for players of all standards.
sports.training: Coaching available for all levels, squad training for competitive players

sports.name: Swimming
sports.description: Our 25-metre, six-lane pool in the Health and Fitness Centre provides outstanding facilities for swimmers at every level.
sports.training: Squad sessions before school and after school, recreational swimming available

sports.name: Athletics
sports.description: Athletics at CLC covers track and field events, with opportunities from house competitions to national championships.
highlights: Full range of track and field events
Sports Day highlight of summer term
sports.training: After-school athletics club, specialist coaching for field events

sports.name: Rowing
sports.description: CLC has a well-established rowing club, training on the nearby River Severn with excellent facilities and coaching.
facilities: Fleet of boats for all crew sizes
sports.training: Early morning and after-school sessions, weekend regattas

sports.name: Equestrian
sports.description: Equestrian sports are popular at CLC, with girls competing in show jumping, dressage, and eventing.
sports.training: Arranged through local riding schools, weekly squad sessions

sports.name: Dance
sports.description: Dance at CLC spans ballet, contemporary, jazz, tap and more, with two dedicated studios and regular performances.
sports.training: Classes in all styles, company rehearsals, choreography opportunities

sports.name: Gymnastics
sports.description: Gymnastics at CLC develops strength, flexibility and coordination, with recreational and competitive options.
sports.training: After-school clubs, squad training for competitors

sports.name: Skiing
sports.description: Skiing at CLC includes dry slope training locally and annual ski trips to the Alps.
highlights: Annual ski trip to the Alps
sports.training: Weekly sessions at local dry slope, intensive training on ski trips

sports.name: Climbing
sports.description: Indoor climbing develops strength, problem-solving and confidence, with our own climbing wall in the Health and Fitness Centre.
sports.training: Regular climbing club sessions, outdoor trips in holidays

sports.name: Squash
sports.description: Squash is available for all levels, from beginners to competitive players, with multiple courts on site.
sports.training: Coaching sessions and match play available

sports.name: Badminton
sports.description: Badminton is a popular recreational and competitive sport at CLC, played in our sports halls.

sports.name: Football
sports.description: Football has grown rapidly at CLC, with house competitions and inter-school fixtures increasingly popular.

sports.name: Cross Country
sports.description: Cross country running makes use of the beautiful Cotswolds countryside surrounding Cheltenham.
sports.training: Weekly running club, Saturday morning runs

sports.name: Yoga & Pilates
sports.description: Yoga and Pilates support physical and mental wellbeing, available to all students.

sports.name: Fitness & Conditioning
sports.description: Our state-of-the-art Health and Fitness Centre is available for all students to develop their fitness.
sports.training: Open gym sessions, fitness classes, personal training
